name: anvil
description: Product Requirements Document management application for Capabilities and Enablers
author: Darcy Davidson

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.version:sync: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); const clientPkg=require('./client/package.json'); clientPkg.version=pkg.version; require('fs').writeFileSync('./client/package.json', JSON.stringify(clientPkg, null, 2));"
